html: It’s simple: a baby born alive during an attempted abortion should have access to life-saving medical care, not be left to die. html: VA officials talk about implementing changes & making improvements, but it's past time to execute these ideas & make this right for our veterans.
text: VA officials talk about implementing changes & making improvements, but it's past time to execute these ideas & make this right for our veterans.

html: In Central AL, there have been times a veteran has sought out mental health care, received no follow-up, & it resulted in suicide. We have a real problem in some of our VA health care systems. We have failed our veterans time & time again. Now, 20 of them are giving up each day.
text: In Central AL, there have been times a veteran has sought out mental health care, received no follow-up, & it resulted in suicide. We have a real problem in some of our VA health care systems. We have failed our veterans time & time again. Now, 20 of them are giving up each day.

html: 20 veterans commit suicide every day. This is a tragedy we must treat as more than just a number. Only 6 of the 20 who are taking their own lives received VA care in the 2 years prior to their death. One reason that's the case: Veterans don't trust the VA to take care of them.pic.twitter.com/yKXwBSNcw5
text: 20 veterans commit suicide every day. This is a tragedy we must treat as more than just a number. Only 6 of the 20 who are taking their own lives received VA care in the 2 years prior to their death. One reason that's the case: Veterans don't trust the VA to take care of them.pic.twitter.com/yKXwBSNcw5

html: In Central AL, not only do we lack the personnel to handle caring for veterans at the VA, we also have a hard time recruiting outside providers because the VA makes it difficult to exchange medical records. text: In Central AL, not only do we lack the personnel to handle caring for veterans at the VA, we also have a hard time recruiting outside providers because the VA makes it difficult to exchange medical records. html: H.R. 8 would make these actions illegal: Loaning a gun to your neighbor, donating a firearm to a museum, gifting a gun to a relative. The bill would even make it a crime to remove firearms from a friend's house, at their request, if they express concerns about suicidal thoughts.
text: H.R. 8 would make these actions illegal: Loaning a gun to your neighbor, donating a firearm to a museum, gifting a gun to a relative. The bill would even make it a crime to remove firearms from a friend's house, at their request, if they express concerns about suicidal thoughts.

html: Late last night, I voted against Judiciary Committee passage of H.R. 8, a poorly drafted & ill-considered bill that would punish lawful gun owners without doing anything to prevent gun violence.

html: I encourage you to read Jeanie's powerful story, & I hope you'll visit Montgomery to experience the city's place in the Civil Rights Movement. From the Civil Rights Memorial Center to the Rosa Parks Museum & Dr. King's Dexter Avenue Baptist Church, there is much to absorb.

html: The City of Montgomery, my hometown, has a deep history that helped, & continues to be instrumental, in shaping the character of our nation. There are few places in this country where the struggle to achieve justice can be felt as powerfully.

html: 45 yrs ago, SCOTUS offered its Roe v. Wade decision that legalized abortion on demand. Since then, more than 60 million babies have had their lives ended by abortion. To say this is a tragedy is an understatement. I won’t stop fighting until our laws protect life at every stage.

html: Human trafficking is happening all around us, on a daily basis, in plain sight. It is our responsibility to stop these heinous crimes & take action when we see them happening. If you have any information, call 334-242-1142 or file a report online here: https://app.alea.gov/SAR

html: In recent weeks, POTUS has signed several bills that demonstrate our commitment to eradicating human trafficking. TODAY, he'll sign the Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act, which tightens criteria for whether countries are meeting standards for ending trafficking.

html: A month ago, Hurricane Michael, the 3rd most powerful hurricane to ever make landfall on U.S. mainland, ravaged areas of AL, FL, & GA. AL-02 was badly impacted in the Wiregrass, & our farmers face severe devastation. We must ensure AL farmers are included in all recovery efforts.pic.twitter.com/fFCvOTRdGF
text: A month ago, Hurricane Michael, the 3rd most powerful hurricane to ever make landfall on U.S. mainland, ravaged areas of AL, FL, & GA. html: Updating the ATCT at Maxwell is long overdue. I've personally climbed up the antiquated tower & can attest to how dangerous it is & how badly it needs to be replaced. I am very pleased that this issue is being addressed through the recently passed military funding bill.
text: Updating the ATCT at Maxwell is long overdue. I've personally climbed up the antiquated tower & can attest to how dangerous it is & how badly it needs to be replaced. I am very pleased that this issue is being addressed through the recently passed military funding bill.

html: I'm pleased to announce that Maxwell-Gunter Air Force Base in Montgomery will receive $18 million from the Air Force’s Fiscal Year 2019 military construction account for a new air traffic control tower:https://roby.house.gov/newsroom/press-releases/roby-maxwell-lands-funding-new-air-traffic-control-tower …

html: As of now, CMS offers only 2 choices for women following a mastectomy: reconstructive surgery or a prefabricated breast prosthetic. The latter have been described as shapeless, heavier than the normal breast, & cumbersome to wear. Read my full letter here:https://roby.house.gov/newsroom/press-releases/roby-advocates-survivors-during-breast-cancer-awareness-month …
text: As of now, CMS offers only 2 choices for women following a mastectomy: reconstructive surgery or a prefabricated breast prosthetic. The latter have been described as shapeless, heavier than the normal breast, & cumbersome to wear. Read my full letter here:https://roby.house.gov/newsroom/press-releases/roby-advocates-survivors-during-breast-cancer-awareness-month …

html: October is #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth, & today I sent a letter to CMS Administrator Verma requesting that CMS modify its coverage determination to allow breast cancer survivors to have the option to receive custom fabricated breast prosthetics after a mastectomy if they choose.pic.twitter.com/0uxUM65mp1
text: October is #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth, & today I sent a letter to CMS Administrator Verma requesting that CMS modify its coverage determination to allow breast cancer survivors to have the option to receive custom fabricated breast prosthetics after a mastectomy if they choose.pic.twitter.com/0uxUM65mp1

html: Just finished up a tour of #HurricaneMichael damaged areas in Geneva & Houston Counties. Saw lots of wind damage, downed power lines & debris. Crews are steadily working to assist those in southeast AL.@AlabamaEMApic.twitter.com/YLyrdEA3cD
text: Just finished up a tour of #HurricaneMichael damaged areas in Geneva & Houston Counties. Saw lots of wind damage, downed power lines & debris. Crews are steadily working to assist those in southeast AL.@AlabamaEMApic.twitter.com/YLyrdEA3cD

html: Wiregrass cotton took a beating from Hurricane Michael. Farmer Fred Helms said he previously expected 1,000 pounds of cotton per acre. Post-storm, he’s looking at 350 pounds an acre. Some farmers are estimating total losses. #HurricaneMichael @spannpic.twitter.com/vmW7wbhRtZ
text:
Wiregrass cotton took a beating from Hurricane Michael.

Farmer Fred Helms said he previously expected 1,000 pounds of cotton per acre. Post-storm, he’s looking at 350 pounds an acre. Some farmers are estimating total losses. 

#HurricaneMichael @spannpic.twitter.com/vmW7wbhRtZ

html: Crews from all over are in the Wiregrass helping us! I saw three City of Hoover emergency vehicles earlier! Thank you all. There are many others!!!

html: 4pm Michael update: As of late Wednesday afternoon, Hurricane Michael has caused 17,000 customers to lose service in the Wiregrass. These include customers in Houston, Henry, Geneva, Dale, Barbour, and Coffee Counties.
text:
4pm Michael update: 

As of late Wednesday afternoon, Hurricane Michael has caused 17,000 customers to lose service in the Wiregrass. These include customers in Houston, Henry, Geneva, Dale, Barbour, and Coffee Counties.

html: Veterans w/ prescription needs may take their empty VA prescription bottles to any drug store in the CVS Caremark network. You'll need your VA ID card & the empty VA prescription bottle. Note that controlled substance prescriptions won't be refilled under this disaster plan.
text: Veterans w/ prescription needs may take their empty VA prescription bottles to any drug store in the CVS Caremark network. You'll need your VA ID card & the empty VA prescription bottle. Note that controlled substance prescriptions won't be refilled under this disaster plan.

html: FYI for AL-02 veterans: Ahead of #HurricaneMichael, the Wiregrass VA Clinic on Ft. Rucker, the Dothan Primary Clinic on Alexander Dr., & the Dothan VA Clinic on Ross Clark Cir. are CLOSED today. All clinics are scheduled to reopen on October 11, 2018, weather permitting.

html: This is a commonsense measure. The VA should be authorized to pay for medical foster homes to give veterans who are eligible for nursing home care the choice to reside in a more family-like setting, w/o forcing them to pay personally. I look forward to supporting the bill today.
text: This is a commonsense measure. The VA should be authorized to pay for medical foster homes to give veterans who are eligible for nursing home care the choice to reside in a more family-like setting, w/o forcing them to pay personally. I look forward to supporting the bill today.

html: Today the House will vote on H.R. 5693, the Long Term Care Veterans Choice Act. The bill would establish a 3-year pilot program allowing the VA to pay for medical foster care for those veterans who are eligible for nursing home care. https://veterans.house.gov/uploadedfiles/h.r._5693_the_long_term_care_veterans_choice_act.pdf …
text: Today the House will vote on H.R. 5693, the Long Term Care Veterans Choice Act. html: The #TaxCutsandJobsAct roughly doubled the standard deduction while lowering tax rates. B/c of this historic tax reform, 90% of Americans have seen bigger paychecks this year. Plus, more than 4 million Americans have seen increased wages, bonuses, & expanded retirement options.

html: Over the last year & a half, Republicans in Congress & the Trump Administration have worked to unleash our economy & foster growth here in the United States. Since November 2016, 3.7 million jobs have been created. 1 million of those came after the #TaxCutsandJobsAct became law.

html: The FY19 Labor-HHS funding bill maintains key pro-life provisions, including the Hyde Amendment, which bans taxpayer $ from being used for abortions, & the Dickey-Wicker Amendment, which bans Labor-HHS funding from being used on research that harms human embryos.
text: The FY19 Labor-HHS funding bill maintains key pro-life provisions, including the Hyde Amendment, which bans taxpayer $ from being used for abortions, & the Dickey-Wicker Amendment, which bans Labor-HHS funding from being used on  research that harms human embryos.

html: We can do better. Science advances every single day, and I am eager to do what I can to reverse these numbers and save more lives. I appreciated being part of this important discussion about rare cancers today.
text: We can do better. Science advances every single day, and I am eager to do what I can to reverse these numbers and save more lives. I appreciated being part of this important discussion about rare cancers today.

html: Today I attended a briefing about rare cancers where I had the opportunity to address the group. There are 374 rare cancers & only 40 FDA-approved targeted therapies. This number is worse for children. There are 55 pediatric rare cancers & only ONE targeted treatment available.pic.twitter.com/8XPpt5JP3j
text: Today I attended a briefing about rare cancers where I had the opportunity to address the group. There are 374 rare cancers & only 40 FDA-approved targeted therapies. html: By passing this bill, the House has taken another step toward improving access to care for our nation’s veterans. This legislation addresses a number of important pieces of the large VA puzzle, including extending funding for the Choice Program that countless veterans depend on.
text: By passing this bill, the House has taken another step toward improving access to care for our nation’s veterans. This legislation addresses a number of important pieces of the large VA puzzle, including extending funding for the Choice Program that countless veterans depend on.

html: Great news: The House just passed the VA MISSION Act! This bill funds the Choice Program, improves incentives to recruit, hire, & retain qualified medical professionals, & expands the VA's Post-9/11 Caregiver Program to all eras. My statement: https://roby.house.gov/newsroom/press-releases/house-passes-va-mission-act-extends-funding-choice-program ….

html: It’s no secret that Iran has not stopped its efforts to obtain a nuclear weapon, and we must take this threat very seriously in our future negotiations with the leading state sponsor of terrorism.
text: It’s no secret that Iran has not stopped its efforts to obtain a nuclear weapon, and we must take this threat very seriously in our future negotiations with the leading state sponsor of terrorism.

html: Moving forward, Congress must stand locked-arm in our approach to dealing with this rogue nation for the sake of our national security. I believe it is imperative that we reinstate the economic sanctions against Iran that were in place prior to this nuclear agreement.
text: Moving forward, Congress must stand locked-arm in our approach to dealing with this rogue nation for the sake of our national security. I believe it is imperative that we reinstate the economic sanctions against Iran that were in place prior to this nuclear agreement.

html: I strongly opposed this Obama-era executive agreement, and I support the Trump Administration's efforts to ensure that we truly end Iran's nuclear weapons program.
text: I strongly opposed this Obama-era executive agreement, and I support the Trump Administration's efforts to ensure that we truly end Iran's nuclear weapons program.

html: I just finished a great lunch meeting with the Dothan Kiwanis Club! We discussed a number of important topics, including progress on the new farm bill and efforts by Congress and the Trump Administration to secure our southern border. Thank you for hosting me!pic.twitter.com/mtySFx8o2l

html: I enjoyed visiting the Wiregrass Museum of Art today! It was especially great to talk w/ students from Grandview Elementary School who were at the museum for an art class. I was truly impressed by all the exciting developments at the museum - thanks for having me!pic.twitter.com/K72oHKI0xQ

html: Today @GovernorKayIvey signed the Federal-State agreement with the Federal Coordinating officer Thomas J. McCool. The federal government can now release funds to assist communities & individuals who experienced damage due to the severe weather during the March 19th storms.pic.twitter.com/Te8b28L5G1 – at Governor's Office
text: Today @GovernorKayIvey signed the Federal-State agreement with the Federal Coordinating officer Thomas J. McCool. The federal government can now release funds to assist communities & individuals who experienced damage due to the severe weather during the March 19th storms.pic.twitter.com/Te8b28L5G1 – at Governor's Office

html: Did you know that small businesses employ more than 47% of the private sector employees in the US? This week is Small Business Week, and I’m excited to celebrate the nearly 30 million small businesses nationwide. #SmallBusinessWeekpic.twitter.com/IqiAe5uNjJ

html: Today is National Prescription Drug #TakeBackDay. Visit http://TakeBackDay.dea.gov  to find a safe-disposal site to get rid of your unneeded or expired pills so that your home does not contribute to an overdose, or create or fuel an abuse or addiction problem.pic.twitter.com/8CvYkLrXsD

html: I am pleased that the Trump Administration has made a federal disaster declaration for the 4 Alabama counties that were impacted by the severe storms & tornadoes that occurred in our state last month.
text: I am pleased that the Trump Administration has made a federal disaster declaration for the 4 Alabama counties that were impacted by the severe storms & tornadoes that occurred in our state last month.

html: ICYMI: It's been reported that several city & state governments are considering laws to blacklist some federal contractors b/c they wish to work on bolstering the infrastructure at the southern border, including construction of a wall. AG Sessions & I agree: This is unacceptable.https://twitter.com/yhn/status/989882074642501632 …

html: I am proud to be unapologetically pro-life, and I strongly believe that our online platforms must be neutral public forms that will allow us to continue to speak out for the unborn.
text: I am proud to be unapologetically pro-life, and I strongly believe that our online platforms must be neutral public forms that will allow us to continue to speak out for the unborn.

html: It is appalling to see that the very unborn children who cannot yet speak for themselves have an advocate like @MarshaBlackburn fighting for them – only to be erased by others.
text: It is appalling to see that the very unborn children who cannot yet speak for themselves have an advocate like @MarshaBlackburn fighting for them – only to be erased by others.

html: As I said in the @HouseJudiciary hearing, our First Amendment rights should be upheld whether we are speaking words in an open forum, writing words in a book, or typing words online.
text: As I said in the @HouseJudiciary hearing, our First Amendment rights should be upheld whether we are speaking words in an open forum, writing words in a book, or typing words online.

html: Today during our @HouseJudiciary hearing, my friend @MarshaBlackburn shared her personal experience w/ online censorship. On one occasion, an online platform removed her pro-life message about fighting the sale of baby body parts because the company deemed it "inflammatory."pic.twitter.com/noSFiqcdm1
text: Today during our @HouseJudiciary hearing, my friend @MarshaBlackburn shared her personal experience w/ online censorship. On one occasion, an online platform removed her pro-life message about fighting the sale of baby body parts because the company deemed it "inflammatory."pic.twitter.com/noSFiqcdm1

html: There are reports that some city & state govts are passing laws to blacklist federal contractors, some from AL, because they wish to work on behalf of the federal govt to bolster the infrastructure at our southern border & more. AG Sessions & I agree: We will NOT accept this.pic.twitter.com/hSbzuU5AS1
text: There are reports that some city & state govts are passing laws to blacklist federal contractors, some from AL, because they wish to work on behalf of the federal govt to bolster the infrastructure at our southern border & more. AG Sessions & I agree: We will NOT accept this.pic.twitter.com/hSbzuU5AS1

html: Madina Qasimi, Former Chief of Staff to the First Lady of Afghanistan, came by my office today to brief me on Afghan women’s recent achievements as well as some of the challenges they continue to face each day.
